data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Surguja.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Surguja, Chhattisgarh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Surguja, Chhattisgarh, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Surguja to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Surguja unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Spirit, I pray that the Daraiha people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, make the 25,959 believers in Surguja to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 2,333,941 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Surguja to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 2,333,941 lost in Surguja that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light
